title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
**Description:**

Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, specially designed in California. This incredible dehydrator offers a large drying space with 6 trays made of durable stainless steel material. Each tray has a generous size of 12 x 13 inches, providing a total drying space of 6.48 square feet. 

With a powerful 600W motor, this dehydrator utilizes hot air circulation from the rear fan to evenly dry your food. It also features a temperature control range of 95°–165°F, allowing you to easily adjust the drying temperature according to your needs. The digital control panel and touch-control LED display make it simple to operate and monitor.

Safety is a top priority with this dehydrator. It is equipped with an auto shutoff feature and overheat protection, ensuring peace of mind while using it. Additionally, the noise level is less than 48dB, providing a quiet operation.

Cleaning is a breeze as the trays are dishwasher safe, saving you time and effort. The dehydrator is compatible with 120V voltage and suitable for use in the USA and Canada. The glass door allows you to monitor the drying process without opening the dehydrator.

But that's not all! This dehydrator also comes with additional accessories to enhance your dehydrating experience. It includes a mesh screen measuring 10.7 x 11.8 inches, perfect for drying smaller items like herbs or spices. You'll also receive a fruit roll sheet measuring 11.3 x 12.8 inches, ideal for creating delicious and healthy fruit roll-ups.

The COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky is not just a dehydrator; it's a versatile kitchen companion. It extends the shelf life of your favorite foods and comes with 50 included recipes to inspire your culinary creations. Don't miss out on this fantastic dehydrator that combines quality, convenience, and innovation.

Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky! Designed in California, this powerful dehydrator offers a large drying space for all your jerky needs. With a power rating of 600W and a maximum temperature of 165°F / 73°C, you can trust that this dehydrator will deliver outstanding results every time.

Featuring hot air circulation from the rear fan, this dehydrator ensures even and consistent drying throughout. The dehydrator comes with 6 stainless steel trays, each measuring 12 x 13 inches, providing a total drying space of 6.48ft². These trays are dishwasher safe, making clean-up a breeze.

The digital control panel allows you to easily set the desired temperature within the range of 95°–165°F. The timer function allows you to set the dehydrator for up to 48 hours, giving you complete control over the drying process. 

Safety is a top priority, as this dehydrator is equipped with auto shutoff and overheat protection features. With a noise level of less than 48dB, you can enjoy a quiet operation while your food is being dehydrated.

Compatible with the voltage of 120V, this dehydrator is suitable for use in the USA and Canada. The glass door and touch-control LED display add a modern touch to its design. The memory function allows you to easily recall your preferred settings, while the extended shelf life feature helps preserve the freshness of your dehydrated food.

But that's not all! This dehydrator also comes with 50 included recipes to inspire your culinary creations. Additionally, you'll receive a mesh screen measuring 10.7 x 11.8 inches and a fruit roll sheet measuring 11.3 x 12.8 inches as part of the package.

Upgrade your jerky game with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Get yours now and experience the difference!
